text:
What’s left of a downpour?/ Raindrops caught in flared petals/ Skyfall splashed/ Into spiderwebbed dew/ Into haphazard permanence/ Before We - the sun, the bees -/ Resume entropy’s business/

Perched on outstretched stalks:/ Rigid liquid -/ A varnish spilled here, beaded there/ Little spheres, tense with geometry,/ Sweat on the lip of a jar./
